system.description: Effect: Can only be used if you have at least 1 Stockpile Stack. You spend all of your Stockpile stacks to heal. Swallow heals 1/4 Max HP for 1 Stack, 1/2 Max HP for 2 stacks, and heals all HP for 3 stacks.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: Effect: Can only be used if you have at least 1 Stockpile Stack. You spend all of your Stockpile stacks to heal. Swallow heals 1/4 Max HP for 1 Stack, 1/2 Max HP for 2 stacks, and heals all HP for 3 stacks.
